name.ja: <ruby>青<rt>あお</rt></ruby>き<ruby>眼<rt>め</rt></ruby>の<ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When a monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 8 or higher LIGHT Attribute Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you have "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" face-up on your field, you can destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.
